TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AxisScrollBar extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

span.span: Represents the scrollbar of a chart axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类公开为 类的属性 。The class is exposed as the property of the class. 滚动条允许最终用户在显示数据的子集时滚动浏览数据。Scrollbars allow the end user to scroll through data when a subset of data is being displayed. 部分数据被称为视图，由 类表示。A subset of data is referred to as a view, and is represented by the class. 仅在进行缩放时显示滚动条。Scrollbars are only shown when zooming occurs. 换句话说，即使滚动条处于启用状态，它也只有在显示视图时才可见。In other words, even if a scrollbar is enabled, it will only be visible when a view is being displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要修复滚动条的位置，图表区的绘图区位置不能设置为 。To fix the position of scrollbars, the plotting area position of a chart area must not be set to . 若要显式设置绘图区位置，请使用 属性。To explicitly set the plotting area position, use the property. 若要在第一次显示图表时显示滚动条，请使用 类属性和方法，以使视图最初向最终用户显示。To display scrollbars when a chart is first displayed, use the class properties and methods so that a view is initially displayed to end users. 可以使用此类设置背景色、按钮颜色和滚动条的宽度 。The background color, button color and width of scrollbars can be set using this class. 请注意，有两种主要的滚动类型：大型滚动，当最终用户在滚动条的背景中单击（即，滚动条未涵盖的滚动条部分）时，就会发生这种情况。和小滚动，当最终用户单击左/右或向上/向下按钮时，就会发生这种情况。Note that there are two main types of scrolling: large scrolling, which occurs when the end user clicks in the background of a scrollbar - that is, that part of a scrollbar not covered by the thumb; and small scrolling, which occurs when the end user clicks a left/right or up/down button. 若要控制大幅滚动大小，请使用 对象的属性 。To control the large scrolling size, use the property of the object. 若要设置较小的滚动大小，请使用 类的属性 。To set the small scrolling size, use the property of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置滚动条的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of a scrollbar.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示滚动条的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the background color of the scrollbar.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 颜色。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color. 如果此属性的值为 ，则滚动条的背景色将由 滚动条所用于的图表区的属性值决定。If the value of this property is , the background color of the scrollbar will be determined by the property value of the chart area the scrollbar is being used for.

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the scrollbar buttons.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示滚动条按钮的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the color of the scrollbar buttons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可获取或设置滚动条的左/右、上/下、重置和滚动块按钮的颜色。Use this property to get or set the color of the left/right, up/down, reset and thumb buttons of a scrollbar. 如果此属性的值为 ，则用于按钮的颜色将由 属性值确定。If the value of this property is , the color used for the buttons will be determined by the property value.

summary.span: 获取或设置滚动条的线条颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the line color of a scrollbar.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示滚动条的线条颜色。

span.span: A value that represents the line color of the scrollbar.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 "向上/向下" 和 "左/右" 按钮中的箭头、"重置" 按钮内的符号以及整个滚动条的边框的颜色。This property represents the color used for the arrows in up/down and left/right buttons, the symbol inside the reset button, as well as the border of the entire scrollbar. 如果此属性的值为 ，则使用的线条颜色将由 属性值决定。If the value of this property is , the line color used will be determined by the property value.

summary.span: 获取或设置滚动条的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of a scrollbar, in pixels.

value.span: 滚动条的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width of a scrollbar in pixels.
The default value is 14 pixels.

value.span: 该值的范围是 5 到 20 像素。

span.span: The value can range from 5 to 20 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置滚动条的宽度（可为5到20个像素）。Gets or sets the width of a scrollbar, which can be from 5 to 20 pixels. 将此属性设置为零可禁用滚动条。Set this property to zero to disable a scrollbar. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要修复滚动条的位置，图表区的绘图区位置不能设置为 。To fix the position of scrollbars, the plotting area position of a chart area must not be set to . 若要显式设置绘图区位置，请使用 属性。To explicitly set the plotting area position, use the property.
